meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to one millionth of a mole.
meanings.sent1: She measured the amount of sugar in the solution in micromoles.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the concentration of the compound in micromoles per liter.
meanings.sent3: The tiny creatures in the pond were so small, you could count them in micromoles!
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky twinkled like micromoles scattered across the universe.
meanings.sent5: The student visualized micromoles as tiny, magical particles dancing under the microscope.
